name: Pipecat Examples Development
onCreateCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r dev-requirements.txt && pip install python-dotenv fastapi uvicorn
postCreateCommand: echo '#!/bin/bash' > /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'if [ -z "$1" ]; then echo "Usage: setup-example <example-name>"; echo "Example: setup-example simple-chatbot"; exit 1; fi' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'EXAMPLE_DIR="examples/$1/server"' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'if [ ! -d "$EXAMPLE_DIR" ]; then echo "Example $1 not found in $EXAMPLE_DIR"; exit 1; fi' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'cd "$EXAMPLE_DIR"' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'echo "Setting up example: $1"' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'python -m venv venv' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'source venv/bin/activate' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'pip install --upgrade pip' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'pip install -r requirements.txt' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'if [ -f env.example ]; then cp env.example .env; echo "Created .env from env.example - please add your API keys"; fi' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'echo "Setup complete! To activate the environment, run:"' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && echo 'echo "cd $EXAMPLE_DIR && source venv/bin/activate"' >> /usr/local/bin/setup-example && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/setup-example && cp .devcontainer/list-examples.sh /usr/local/bin/list-examples && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/list-examples
